snippet: The approaching federal fiscal cliff brings the prospect of higher investment taxes and weaker financial markets, advisers warn.
abstract: Advisers warn approaching federal fiscal cliff brings the prospect of higher investment taxes and weaker financial markets, but expect a full-throttle plunge to be averted; top tax rates on long-term capital gains could rise to 20 percent and on dividend income.
lead_paragraph: The approaching federal fiscal cliff brings the prospect of higher investment taxes and weaker financial markets, advisers warn.

headline.seo: Mutual Fund Planning, With the Fiscal Cliff in Mind
headline.main: Fund Investors Are Nearing the Edge, Too
headline.print_headline: Fund Investors Are Nearing the Edge, Too
